title: Las Vegas shooting - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/2/17
itunes:title: Las Vegas shooting - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/2/17
description:
George Noory and former FBI Special Agent John DeSouza discuss the deadly mass shooting in Las Vegas and whether to believe government reports about the shooter and his motives.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
